moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 Bb4 4. a3 Bxc3: Maybe hold off on this move
moves.12. Ba3: Develops the bishop and pins the pawn.
moves.12... Rc8: Putting pressure on the c4 bishop
moves.13. Qb3: Creating a queen bishop battery and pressuring the b7 bishop
moves.13... Re8: developing the rook and unpinning the c5 pawn
moves.16... Ne3: Good move forking bishop and rook.
moves.17... Nxc4: Retreating the bishop is much stronger.
moves.21. c4 Qg5 22. d5 exd5 23. Rxd5 Rxe2: A Big mistake, Qe3  allows black to go into endgame a pawn up.
